thread.title: Sergio Aguero will stay and fight for his Man City place | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Sergio Aguero will stay and fight for his Man City place | Daily Mail Online

author: Chris Wheeler For The Daily Mail
title: Sergio Aguero will stay and fight for his Man City place | Daily Mail Online
text: Manchester City ace Sergio Aguero will stay and fight for his place say the club, as the Argentine loses his place to youngster Gabriel Jesus Sergio Aguero will stay and fight for his place at Manchester City, say the club The Argentinian has fallen down the pecking order behind Gabriel Jesus The youngster was the star of the show as City snatched a win over Swansea After the game Aguero suggested he may have to consider his career in summer Real Madrid are believed to have a long-term interest in Aguero, as do PSG Published: 22:30 GMT, 6 February 2017 | Updated: 23:22 GMT, 6 February 2017 157 shares
